Package controllers

Class RentBikeController

java.lang.Object
controllers.EcoBikeBaseController
controllers.RentBikeController
public class RentBikeController
extends EcoBikeBaseController
This class handles rent bike, return bike and pause bike rental request from customers

  • Method Details

    • getRentBikeServiceController

      public static RentBikeController getRentBikeServiceController​(InterbankInterface interbankSystem)

    • rentBike

      public boolean rentBike​(Bike bikeToRent, CreditCard card) throws EcoBikeException, java.sql.SQLException, java.io.IOException
      Rent a bike by a given card. This function will try to deduct money from the interbank, and if the transaction is successfuly, it will change the bike status and modify the database correspodingly
      Parameters:
      bikeToRent - The bike to be rented
      card - the card to perform transaction
      Returns:
      true if process is OK, false otherwise
      Throws:
      EcoBikeException
      java.sql.SQLException
      java.io.IOException

    • pauseBikeRental

      public int pauseBikeRental​(Bike bike)
      Pause rental of a bike
      Parameters:
      bike - the bike to pause rental
      Returns:

    • resumeBikeRental

      public void resumeBikeRental​(Bike bike)

    • returnBike

      public Invoice returnBike​(Bike bikeToRent, Dock dockToReturn, CreditCard card) throws java.io.IOException, java.sql.SQLException, EcoBikeException, java.text.ParseException
      Pay rental for a bike by a given card and return it to the selected dock. This function will try to deduct money from the interbank, and if the transaction is successfuly, it will change the bike status and modify the database correspodingly
      Parameters:
      bikeToRent - The bike to be rented
      dockToReturn - the dock to return the bike
      card - the card to perform transaction
      Returns:
      true if process is OK, false otherwise
      Throws:
      EcoBikeException
      java.sql.SQLException
      java.io.IOException
      java.text.ParseException

    • getRentalFee

      public float getRentalFee​(Bike bike)
      Return rental fee of the selected bike
      Parameters:
      bike - the bike having rental fee to be queried
      Returns:
      the bike's rental fee if found the record in database; -1 otherwise
